name: Ch9BBaseConvo4
_source: speak;Kyle;Joshua!|I know you're around here somewhere!|Show yourself!
speak;Joshua;Well, if it isn't my favorite knight.|Out for a stroll in town, Kyle?
speak;Kyle;Don't play innocent with me.|You were supposed to be on patrol duty two hours ago!
speak;Joshua;Was I?|Must have slipped my mind.|I was just testing the local tavern's luck.
speak;Kyle;This isn't a game, Joshua!|Prince Ephraim assigned you to the eastern perimeter.|Your gambling can wait!
speak;Joshua;Care to make a wager on that?|Heads I go on patrol now, tails I go tonight instead?
speak;Kyle;No more coin flips!|No more cards!|No more dice!|Just do your duty!
speak;Joshua;You know what they say...|All work and no play makes Kyle a dull knight.
speak;Kyle;And all play and no work gets soldiers killed.|Is that what you want?
speak;Joshua;...No.|You know that's not what I want.
speak;Kyle;Then why do I have to chase you through town every time you're assigned to patrol?
speak;Joshua;Maybe I enjoy the exercise?|Or maybe I enjoy watching you get all worked up.|Your face turns the most fascinating shade of red.
speak;Kyle;This isn't funny!|Forde is covering for you right now!|He's pulled a double shift because of you!
speak;Joshua;Forde is covering for me?|He didn't mention that when we played cards earlier...
speak;Kyle;FORDE!|You were playing cards with Joshua?!|You told me you would cover his patrol!
speak;Forde;Did I say that?|Must have slipped my mind.|We only played for an hour or so.
speak;Kyle;Not you too!|Am I the only one who takes our duties seriously?!
speak;Kyle;I'm surrounded by children...|What would Prince Ephraim say if he knew?
speak;Ephraim;He might say his knights could use some discipline.
speak;Kyle;P-Prince Ephraim!|I was just trying to get these two to—
speak;Ephraim;I heard everything, Kyle.|Your dedication is commendable.
speak;Joshua;Would Your Highness care to flip for it?|Heads we're forgiven, tails we take double patrol duty?
speak;Ephraim;A gamble, is it?|Very well, Joshua.|But I'll set the terms.
speak;Ephraim;If you win, you're forgiven.|If you lose, you AND Forde will patrol the perimeter for the next three days.|No breaks.
speak;Forde;Wait a minute!|Don't I get a say in this?
speak;Ephraim;A joke, Joshua.|But it seems I've found a way to get your attention.|Report for patrol duty in five minutes.|Both of you.
speak;Joshua;I can't believe it...|Outplayed by Prince Ephraim himself.
speak;Forde;Next time, Joshua...|Let's gamble on something that doesn't involve me.
speak;Joshua;Fair enough.|Kyle, care to join us on patrol?|I bet I can spot more enemies than you.
speak;Kyle;No bets.|But I'll join you.|Someone needs to keep you two in line.
speak;Joshua;One last wager before we go?|I bet tomorrow I'll report for duty without you having to find me.
speak;Kyle;...And what do I have to do if I lose?
speak;Joshua;Buy me a drink.|And admit I'm not as irresponsible as you think.
speak;Kyle;Deal.|But if I win, no more gambling for a week.
speak;Forde;Is the great gambler backing down from a bet?
speak;Joshua;Never.|It's a deal, Kyle.|Hope you've got coins for that drink!
